description:
We're already helping over 2700 people around the world to improve their English spelling, punctuation and grammar! Why not join them today?

Let's face it - English is one of the most difficult languages to master on Earth! I've used it all of my life and I still find out new things all of the time!

If you have had better things to do since leaving school than remembering what a semi-colon is, then you're in good company. This course takes a fresh look at punctuation, grammar, sentence structure and even a little bit of spelling. It's a great reminder of the things that you probably knew once but have long since forgotten about.

The course is broken down into a series of bite-sized videos that you can refer back to time and time again. So if you want to brush up on your written English and remember what a pronoun is once and for all, then this course is for you! If you want to confidently help your kids with their homework, then this course is for you!

English is the second most widely used language on the planet. This means that English skills are incredibly important to employers - in fact, the English skills of the workforce can have a direct impact on the growth of that business. Employers can see your English skills from the moment you create your resume or fill out an application form - so the better your skills, the more employable you are making yourself.

If you think that this is important, then this course is for you!

Buy now and start improving your English spelling, punctuation and grammar today. And with the Udemy 30-day money back guarantee so you have nothing to lose!

The course covers the following:

  • Punctuation
    • Commas;
    • Colons;
    • Semi-colons;
    • Apostrophes; and
    • Other punctuation marks.
  • Grammar
    • Nouns;
    • Adjectives;
    • Pronouns;
    • Verbs;
    • Adverbs;
    • Tense; and
    • The 'To Be' Verb.
  • Spelling
    • Plurals; and
    • There, They're and Their.
  • Sentences and Paragraphs
    • Capital Letters;
    • Paragraphs; and
    • Sentence Structure.
  • Writing
    • How to write a blog; and
    • Different Types of Text
  • And more!

Please note - I'm based in the UK which is in the GMT time zone. This means that I will answer questions as soon as I can and there may be a short delay before I am able to get back to you.
title: Improve Your English Spelling, Punctuation and Grammar
